name: Trolly Folly
description:
Trolley Folly

This game is a new twist on the common trolley problem, where you can choose between multiple people and animals to kill (or not). Later levels will have you be judged by different characters, which will change the way you make your decisions.

Submission for COMO Game Jam VI

Art: Dante, Jameson

Programming: Drew, John, Jameson

Music: Dante

All assets are original.
